s: Every packet of Magical Flames gives you up to an hour of colorful fire, with the brand recommending you use up to three packets at a time in bigger fires. They are only safe to use in wood-burning fires, so don’t toss one into a propane-fueled fire pit and don’t roast marshmallows or other ...
